surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.value: HDU 1: BOSS spectra taken at Apache Point Observatory
HDU 2: BOSS spectra taken at Las Campanas Observatory
HDU 3: APOGEE spectra taken at Apache Point Observatory
HDU 4: APOGEE spectra taken at Las Campanas Observatory
